jobDescription:
Acme is searching for it's newest Quality Control Supervisor to join the Anvil team. Responsibilities include:

 - Hammering anvils to make sure they're very strong

 - Weighing anvils to ensure they're the perfect weight

 - Tossing anvils off cliffs to catch wiley coyotes
qualifications:
Experience

Toronto Metal Works
2019-2023
 - Led a team of anvil engineers to create new anvil designs
 - Oversaw the successful release of new tiny anvil to market

The Anvil Co.
2017-2019
 - Anvil engineer ensuring high quality products
 - Part of team building new anvil shapes
